game.name: Rotate Maze: G.O.T.S
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as G.O.T.S(Gear Of Time & Space) and explore increasingly complicated mazes! Rotate the maze to traverse!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as G.O.T.S(Gear Of Time & Space) and explore increasingly complicated mazes! Rotate the maze to traverse!
